definitions.definition: hold or express opinions that are at variance with those previously, commonly, or officially expressed.
examples: two members dissented from the majority

definitions.definition: separate from an established or orthodox church because of doctrinal disagreement.
examples: differ, disagree, demur, fail to agree, be at variance/odds, take issue; Moredecline/refuse to support, protest, object, dispute, challenge, quibble "two members dissented"Moredecline/refuse to support, protest, object, dispute, challenge, quibble two members dissented
